Spell.Name: Reflector
Spell.Meta: Gain Reflect for a short duration

Spell.Name: AirSlash
Spell.Meta: Fire a 1x3 shot that pushes enemies back, can hit multiple times

Spell.Name: Backstab
Spell.Meta: Pull poison darts from end of other side

Spell.Name: BladeRain
Spell.Meta: Throw blades on all tiles and crack them.

Spell.Name: Bladeskrieg
Spell.Meta: Throw multiple axes on player tiles
Spell.Flavor: Ah, it looks like it's beginning to rain.

Spell.Name: Bouncing Blade
Spell.Meta: Throw a blade and catch to throw again!

Spell.Name: Blast Crystals
Spell.Meta: Summon two crystals that shoot a 150 damage shot on death

Spell.Name: Blood Shield
Spell.Meta: Gain Poison to gain shield until move

Spell.Name: Bomb Toss
Spell.Meta: Throw a destroyable bomb 4 tiles ahead

Spell.Name: BouncyBall
Spell.Meta: Hit every other tile in front

Spell.Name: Bow Snipe
Spell.Meta: Charge for 0.5s then fire a powerful shot
Spell.Flavor: If I miss, it means I'm just another dude with a bow

Spell.Name: Breakout
Spell.Flavor: When you need some personal space

Spell.Name: Cold Grasp
Spell.Meta: Pulls an icebolt from behind enemies

Spell.Name: Cold Medicine
Spell.Meta: Heals but applies frost for 0 mana

Spell.Name: Cold Snap
Spell.Flavor: Is it just me or is it cold in here?

Spell.Name: Counter Strike
Spell.Meta: Launch an arrow of energy forward
Spell.Flavor: It protec but it also attac

Spell.Name: Crossfire
Spell.Flavor: Don't get caught in this one

Spell.Name: DeckSlam
Spell.Meta: Shot deals 10 dmg for each card in deck

Spell.Name: Ember
Spell.Meta: Create a flame 4 tiles in front

Spell.Name: Entangle
Spell.Meta: Hits all tiles in front, Rooting enemies

Spell.Name: Entrench
Spell.Meta: Gain 100 shield, root self. If earthbound, don't root self

Spell.Name: Fate Shield
Spell.Meta: Gain shield, lose shield on hit, slow tall projectile

Spell.Name: Fling
Spell.Meta: Cast spell in other slot and Consume it

Spell.Name: Focus
Spell.Flavor: Mom I just really need to focus on my art right now.

Spell.Name: Knock Up
Spell.Flavor: Looks like you could use a pick me up!

Spell.Name: Frost Barrage
Spell.Meta: Charge for 0.3s then fire a frostbolt in every row

Spell.Name: Frostbite
Spell.Meta: Hit all enemies, dealing 70dmg x frost stacks.

Spell.Name: Frost Volley
Spell.Meta: Charge for 0.3s then fire 4 frostbolts from random tiles

Spell.Name: Frostbolt
Spell.Meta: Charge for 0.15s then fire a frostbolt
Spell.Flavor: This spell isn't just cool, it's Ice Cool

Spell.Name: GuideSpikes
Spell.Meta: Summon spikes that follow player vertical position

Spell.Name: Heal Catch
Spell.Flavor: Are you really playing catch with yourself?

Spell.Name: Hellfire
Spell.Meta: Hits all tiles, can hit self
Spell.Flavor: Like fire, hellfire, this fire in my skin

Spell.Name: Inflame
Spell.Meta: Spreads flames in a cross pattern

Spell.Name: Innervate
Spell.Meta: Gain mana regen til end of battle but slower movement

Spell.Name: Ion Cannon
Spell.Meta: Hits square in center of other field

Spell.Name: Iron Will
Spell.Meta: Shoot a projectile that gives the target

Spell.Name: Jambolt
Spell.Meta: Fire shot add jam to deck

Spell.Name: KillStep
Spell.Meta: Dash fwd 3 tiles then slash 2x3 tiles in front

Spell.Name: Kinetic Wave
Spell.Meta: Hits 4 times in front while pushing enemy back

Spell.Name: Knife
Spell.Flavor: Don't bring this to a gunfight

Spell.Name: Leech
Spell.Meta: Shot, heals 40 hp on hit during battle

Spell.Name: Magic Claw
Spell.Meta: Two slashes in an X 4 tiles in front

Spell.Name: Mana Lattice
Spell.Meta: Summon a gem that gives 3 mana when it is destroyed

Spell.Name: Meditate
Spell.Meta: Freeze for 0.5 sec to gain 2 mana

Spell.Name: Mine
Spell.Meta: Place mine on random enemy tile

Spell.Name: Mirror Damage
Spell.Meta: Shoots a shot that applies Link

Spell.Name: Miss Me Shield
Spell.Meta: Gain shield, lose shield on hit

Spell.Name: OrbitalBeam
Spell.Flavor: I've got friends in high places

Spell.Name: Pinch
Spell.Flavor: Wake me up inside (I can't wake up)

Spell.Name: Ping
Spell.Meta: Fire a rebounding shot at self

Spell.Name: Poison Dart
Spell.Flavor: Poison, the perfect weapon for a snake!

Spell.Name: Poison Tails
Spell.Meta: Hits back column and pushes enemies forward

Spell.Name: Pull
Spell.Flavor: Get over her! She's not worth it man.

Spell.Name: Pyroblast
Spell.Meta: Powerful fireball explodes on hit and damages nearby enemies

Spell.Name: Ragnarok
Spell.Meta: Giant sword deals massive damage 4 tiles in front

Spell.Name: Resonate
Spell.Meta: Creates explosion around all structures, does not damage structures

Spell.Name: RingOfFire
Spell.Meta: Ignites tiles in an O 4 tiles in front
Spell.Flavor: I went down, down, down, and the flames went higher.

Spell.Name: Rock Cycle
Spell.Meta: Fire a rock forward and redeck

Spell.Name: Rock Tomb
Spell.Meta: Fire a rock forward and shield on earthbound

Spell.Name: Shard Toss
Spell.Meta: Throw a timed shard 4 tiles in front.

Spell.Name: Shield Beam
Spell.Meta: Shoot laser and gain shield on hit
Spell.Flavor: It attac but it also protec

Spell.Name: Shield Slam
Spell.Meta: Deal dmg equal to shield, hit 3 squares in front

Spell.Name: Shield Throw
Spell.Meta: Deal dmg equal to shield, lose all shield, pierces
Spell.Flavor: When you have no sword and no options

Spell.Name: Shields Up
Spell.Flavor: The best defense is a good defense

Spell.Name: Shields UpExte
Spell.Flavor: The best defense is a big defense

Spell.Name: Shotgun
Spell.Flavor: Point this at something you don't like

Spell.Name: Smog
Spell.Meta: Rains down 3 waves of 6 shots on random tiles

Spell.Name: Spell Shield
Spell.Meta: Burn a card, gain high shield

Spell.Name: Step Lacerate
Spell.Meta: Dash fwd 3 tiles and hit them
Spell.Flavor: When You were partying I studied The Blade

Spell.Name: Step Slash

Spell.Flavor: Often used to dodge DEADLY LASER BEAMS.

Spell.Name: Step Rise
Spell.Meta: Dash fwd 3 tiles then slash 2x3 tiles in front

Spell.Name: Step Spin
Spell.Meta: Dash fwd 3 tiles then slash surrounding tiles

Spell.Name: Assassination
Spell.Meta: Dash fwd and hit one tile

Spell.Name: Fury
Spell.Flavor: You won't like me when I'm angry.

Spell.Name: Blizzard
Spell.Meta: Rains down 8 waves of 6 shots on random tiles slowly

Spell.Name: FireStorm
Spell.Meta: Rains down 3 waves of 4 burning shots on random tiles
Spell.Flavor: And hellfire rained from the sky

Spell.Name: Hailstorm
Spell.Meta: Rains down 3 waves of 6 shots on random tiles

Spell.Name: Swords of Light
Spell.Meta: Rains down 3 waves of 3 of swords that root

Spell.Name: Thunderstorm
Spell.Meta: Rains down 4 waves of 6 thunderstrikes on random enemy tiles

Spell.Meta: Hit all enemy tiles in up and down pattern

Spell.Meta: Shot deals dmg of spell in other slot

Spell.Meta: 3s Rooting swords on all tiles in front

Spell.Meta: Shot and crack surround tiles, earthbound heal tiles?

Spell.Meta: 3x3 explosions on every other tile in front

Spell.Meta: Pulls enemies towards you and hits them, from 2nd to back row

Spell.Meta: Spend all mana, fire a shot for each

Spell.Meta: Creates a copy of itself in deck

Spell.Meta: Knives from behind, can hit self

Spell.Meta: Hits all tiles in front, Rooting enemies

Spell.Meta: Delayed explosion on current tile, can hit self

Spell.Flavor: I think you zigged when you should've zagged.
